en_US.description: This mod adds several encounters with groups of opponents, three stores, a quest involving a halfling and a ring, and improves the fight against Shagbag.

components.0: Chosen of Mystra's Encounters (Requires Throne of Bhaal)
components.1: Would you like to install improved druid encounters?
components.2: Would you like to install improved Shagbag encounters?

fr_FR.description: Ce mod ajoute plusieurs rencontres avec des groupes d'adversaires, trois magasins, une quête impliquant un halfling et un anneau, et améliore le combat contre Shagbag.

components.0: Rencontres, par Chosen of Mystra (Necessite Throne of Bhaal)

components.2: Vuoi installare gli incontri con Shagbag migliorati?

components.2: Would you like to install improved Shagbag encounters?

zh_CN.description: 此模组增加了与多个敌对群体的遭遇战，三家商店，一个涉及半身人和戒指的任务，并改进了与沙格巴格的战斗。
